1.content: It was a peaceful day on the ARK as Shadow stared at Earth yet again thinking about Maria. He felt hungry and decided to go eat. He walked down the hall to his room that he made himself, mostly by stealing the furniture using Chaos Control. He opened the refrigerator and frowned. "Damn. Out of food again." This meant another trip to Earth to stock up.
1.title: Shadow on the ARK

choices: Shadow tells Sonic that he suspects Eggman is involved.
11.content:
Shadow decided that he really felt like some Chinese food, so he teleported to China. Luckily, it was night there, so stealing some should be a breeze. He ran down the streets of Beijing, not caring about plowing into a few pedestrians. Out of the corner of his eye he spotted something that caught his attention. He skidded to a halt and turned around. There was a perfect store to rob. He teleported inside and then back to the ARK with bags of food. He sorted it, put it away, and turned on the TV. (He gets really good reception in space!) He switched to the news and started eating.

"A massive earthquake struck Mexico to-click-ere at the Savanna Desert which is hav-click-eports of robots that have been stealing parts from a factory in New York." Shadow paused and listened. "Employees say the robots stood on two legs and had two arms, but one arm had a gun on the end. One threatened the workers with the gun as four others gathered parts and then they all fled out of the east entrance. No one else saw these robots, and how they escaped unspotted remains a mystery."
11.title: Stolen Stuff

112.content:
Shadow decided to spend the night hidden in the factory to see if the robots come back. He teleported to New York and Triangle Jumped his way to the top of a builiding. He scanned the horizon for the industrial district and leaped across rooftops to get there. Once he did, he tried to remember where the factory was. Hmmm..... It was near the edge of the district! He saw a street sign on the TV........ Darvy Drive! He remembered Darvy Drive led to the industrial district from... the residential! Shadow then leapt across some more rooftops until he found the factory. The news crew was just leaving. Shadow sat on a nearby rooftop until night fell then snuck into the factory. He used Chaos Control to freeze time so he could find a good hiding spot. The factory was mostly automated and the machines that did the work were scattered in the middle of the factory. Shadow jumped to the top of the machine and used it to get to the rafters of the building. Then there was nothing to do but wait.

After what seemed like hours he saw something out of the corner of his eye. He looked over at the movement and saw...
112.title: Shadow Investigates

12.content:
Sonic was in the ruins in a desert somewhere. He held two SMGs, one in each hand. He grabbed the blue orb and became invisible. He then walked around the corner and there he was, comletely unaware. The green person picked up a spartan laser as Sonic crept around behind and whacked him with one of the SMGs, dropping the other for no apparent reason.

"Haha! I just whooped your Master Chief ass!" (Yea, I'm serious.) "You really need to learn to keep an eye on your radar, Manic."

"Argh! I should have seen that coming." Just then, the XBOX 360 made that signature "badoop" sound, and told them that Tails was online. He sent them a voice message that said...

(For those of you who don't know, Sonic is actually triplets. Manic is Sonic's green, drummin bro, and Sonia is his dark pink, keyboardin', tomboy sis.)
12.title: What is Sonic up to?

13.content:
*wrench noises*

*more wrench noises*

*welding*

"CAN'T YOU GO ANY FASTER?! I WANT THIS DONE BY TOMORROW!"

"YES MASTER."

The next day...

"Good job, Alpha, if I do say so myself."

"THANK YOU MASTER."

"You're much more obidient than Omega! I should have activated you years ago!"

"THANK YOU MASTER."

"With this, we may just defeat Sonic once and for all! HAHaha. Gwahaha! *Other evil laugh noises*

"GWA. HA. HA."
13.title: He IS.....

14.content:
*wrench noises*

*more wrench noises*

"Finally! It's done!"

Tails stood back and marveled at his new and improved Tornado. Now it could travel anywhere. Underwater, space, anywhere. AND it could now reach mach 3! There was a knock on the door. Tails answered it and standing in front of him was Amy.

"Hey, Tails."

"Hi Amy."

"WOAH! What did you do to the Tornado!?"

"I just upgraded it. A lot. Now it's the Tornado Z."

"Cool, by the way, have you seen Sonic?"

"Sigh... No, Amy. Not since last week. Is that all you come over here for?"

"No, I was just asking," she said with a sigh."
14.title: The Tornado Z

141.content:
"Have you invented anything else lately?" Amy asked.

"No, not really. I've spent most of my time working on the Tornado."

"Oh. Don't you ever take a break from inventing?"

"No. Not really. It's actually kinda fun."

Amy frowned. "I think you need to be a little more carefree, Tails. Let's just go watch some TV."

They walked into Tails' living room and sat on the couch. Tails switched on the TV and gasped when he saw...
141.title: They Keep Talking

choices: They get there with no problem.
142.content:
Sonic walked in, completely at random, and without knocking.

"Hey Tails! Can you-oh hi Amy!"

"SONIC!!!" Amy runs up and hugs him. "OH I'VE MISSED YOU IT'S BEEN SO LONG!"

"Amy! You saw me two days ago! Now please let go!"

She reluctantly released her hold on him and sat down on Tails' couch.

"Anyway, Tails can you take me to see Knuckles? Tikal told me to check on him. She said something was wrong."

"Sure, Sonic! We'll get there in no time with the Tornado Z! Are you coming Amy?"

"You know it!"
142.title: Lucky for Amy!

1421.content:
Once they got there they looked around and found nothing out of the ordinary, except Knuckles was nowhere to be found. The Master Emerald was still in place, too.

"Something still doesn't feel right," Sonic said.

"I know what you mean," Amy replied.

"Wait!" shouted Tails.

"What's wrong?" Sonic asked.

"According to the Tornado, the Master Emerald isn't giving off any wavelengths! And sonar doesn't detect a thing!"

Sonic walked up the the Master Emerald with a frown and tried to touch it, but his hand went right through! It was a hologram!

"GASP! The Master Emerald is gone!"

They were trying to think of a plan when...
1421.title: Tikal was Right!  (Dramatic Music)

14212.content:
Just after Sonic stopped touching the hologram of the Master Emerald, a huge cage popped up around all of them.

"Damn it!" Sonic shouted.

"Who is it THIS time?" Amy groaned.

"It's probably just Eggman again," Tails replied. "Usually he'll have showed up and started monologing by now. Doesn't matter, I've got a little trick up my sleeve. Tornado Z, access code 936!"

The plane flew to the cage and hovered above it.

"Sweet!" Sonic said. "How good of hearing does that thing have?"

"It doesn't! I implanted a nanochip in my throat that transmits a wireless signal which is picked up by the-"

"Can you just get us out of here already?!" Amy yelled.

"Okay, okay! Excuse me for being proud of my creations! Tornado Z, access code 936, free us!"

As soon as Tails finished talking the Tornado Z shot a laser towards a few of the bars and carved a hole in it. The trio got back in the Tornado for safety and tried to decide what to do next.

"Why not start with Eggman? He's usually the one responsible for these things!" said Amy.

"But do you really think that Knuckles couldn't protect the Emerald from him? It must've been someone else." Tails said. "Lemme see if the Tornado can pick up any clues." He punched a few buttons and the Tornado scanned the ground. A few seconds later it dinged and showed the results on a computer screen. "Let's see here... Red echidna fur, normal. white bat fur, Rouge!"

"What else?" Amy said and leaned her head up against Sonic.

"Umm... would you believe me if I said..."
14212.title: Caged

info.brief_description: The next chapter of the Sonic series... And YOU get to help write it!
info.description:
The next chapter of the Sonic series... And YOU get to help write it!

I only have a few rules:
1. Graphic sex is allowed, but don't spend more than a few chapters at a time for one sex scene. I don't want this to become just another sex story.
2. No killing off main characters.
3. You can use any Sonic characters from anywhere. Try to keep Sonic X characters to a minimum, though.
4. Don't make this story solely about Sonic, either.

That's it! If you are unhappy with the rules, leave and make your own interactive. It's not that hard.

Lastly, this story takes place 3 years in the future. Amy is now Sonic's girlfriend.
